sentence.Network_en: The young man was Oedipus, who thus unknowingly became the slayer of his own father.

entry.def: If someone slays an animal, they kill it in a violent way.

example.ex: ...the hill where St George slew the dragon.

entry.def: If someone has been slain, they have been murdered.

example.tran: 两名澳大利亚游客被杀。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who causes the death of a person or animal
